thread.title: Excellent Location. Great staff
thread.title_full: Excellent Location. Great staff - Review of DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel New York City - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: OttawaCurler
title: Excellent Location. Great staff
text:
The hotel is a bit dated and the windows need replacing especially on a cold windy day however the location and the service make up for any shortfalls. The broadway plays and multiple great restaurants are all within walking distance. We got a room with a view of times square it is a bit noisy as it is right beside the elevators however it is worth trying at least once as the entertainment of watching out the window is worth the price of admission.
Breakfast buffet was very good with an excellent selection and the omlette station was great.
Will definitely go to this hotel again
Room Tip: Rooms with view of Times Square are noisy but fun. See more room tips
